mapper.insert: insert into "problem" (assignment_id, title, description, full_score, space_limit, time_limit, index_in_assignment, solution, type, number_submit, number_solve, status) VALUES (#{assignmentId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{fullScore}, #{spaceLimit}, #{timeLimit}, #{indexInAssignment}, #{solution}, #{type}, 0, 0, #{status});
mapper.select: select id, assignment_id, title, description, full_score, space_limit, time_limit, number_submit, number_solve, index_in_assignment, solution from "problem" where valid and id in ( select distinct problem_id from "problem_tag" where valid and tag_id = #{id}) and (status = 'public' or status = 'closed');

select count(*) from "problem" where valid
and (status = 'public' or status = 'closed') ;
select group_id from problem p join assignment_group ag on p.assignment_id = ag.assignment_id and p.valid and ag.valid and id = #{pid};
mapper.update: update problem set title = #{param2.title}, description = #{param2.description}, full_score = #{param2.fullScore}, space_limit = #{param2.spaceLimit}, time_limit = #{param2.timeLimit}, solution = #{param2.solution}, type = #{param2.type} where id = #{pid};
